====Usage notes====
* Vulgar characters {{zh-l|肏}} and {{zh-l|屄}} are usually replaced with similar sounding characters, e.g. {{zh-l|操}} for {{zh-l|肏}} and {{zh-l|逼}} for {{zh-l|屄}}. {{zh-l|靠}} is a euphemism for {{zh-l|肏}}. {{zh-l|屄}} is also often written as the English capital letter "B".
